attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS HAS GOT TO STOP EACH DAY WE/SEE HEAR OF CHILDREN DYING WHILE THE FAT CATS GET FATTER ITS TIME WE EVERYDAY PEOPLE MADE A STAND AND FOUGHT FOR BASIC HUMAN RIGHTS FEED THE THE CHILDREN OF THE THIRD WORLD

rejection.details: The excessive use of capital letters makes your petition hard to read. The main sentence should also be a clear call for action from HM Government, not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
